html:
Seek ye/call ye. This passage evokes the familiar and well-beloved invitation from the Lord to his children: "Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you: For every one that asketh receiveth" (Matt. 7:7-8).

found/near. The Lord may be found, and he will be near as long as we desire to be near to him. As he said through Joseph Smith, "Draw near unto me and I will draw near unto you; seek me diligently and ye shall find me; ask, and ye shall receive" (D&C 88:63).
